content: A dear old friend

Generally speaking,
For such a joyous occasion,
we should celebrate by putting up some balloons at the Station!
Classmates who are more than just friends
Stranger

Before the visitor arrived,
Mobai confiscated my surprise box!

Oh, was that your friend who came to visit, Bhan?
They looked just like a merry balloon,
bouncing past us just now!
acquaintances from work and study

Was it because I forgot to reply to her message last time?
Or was it the time before that when I missed our appointment because I was writing?
Or perhaps... {短暂停}hmm, I can't quite remember...

Could it be my "nemesis for life"?!
To walk side by side with my nemesis— no, that's not right...
Like two shadows intertwined... no, that's not it either...

Your friend... quite the chatterbox, aren't they?
They circled around me several times,
Yeep! It startled me so much my tail got all puffed up.
{想象中}What sort of recreational activities should I design,\nto bring joy to everyone?

Oh, I'm contemplating whether to return home,
What if the <color=#c78745>{访客}</color> encounters me...
It's quite challenging, I haven't prepared any conversation topics.

Although when it comes to helping express feelings of the heart,
I've assisted in many ways,
For instance, presenting a "ring inside a balloon."

Just now, I noticed your friend
<color=#c78745>{访客}</color>
had quite an astonished expression.

I wonder what will surprise him?
Oh, I'm simply dying to know~! Hehe~!

However...
In the past, "uninvited visitors" were always here to challenge my expertise.
I should reacquaint myself with the proper protocols of receiving guests.
a friend I've only just made acquaintance with
Lifelong Nemesis

Indeed, yeep~
The intimacy between true friends never lies~
Hmm, come to think of it, my dear friends haven't reached out to me lately...

Yee-hee-hee~! All my "knowledge" comes from the "World University" of my travels!
So theoretically speaking, all travelers are my classmates!

...!
(Draws out the short blade "Oddhead")
I just spotted something unfamiliar here.
Secret Crush

It's like when one person steps left while the other steps right,
and they both collide with a "bang!"—
{短暂停}that kind of perfect synchronization.

Have I lost my way again?
Oh, Bhan! What a pleasant surprise to see you here!
There are so many unfamiliar faces today... it's rather disorienting.

Oh, it's a secret crush~ {短暂停}Hmm?
Is it unrequited love?
Would you like me to{短暂停}tell <color=#c78745>{visitor}</color> about it?

{短暂停}What I mean to say is,
it's the natural connection that makes good friends,
not how long you've known each other!
Childhood friend

Next time friends come to visit, do let me know in advance~
I shall bring forth my entire collection of treasures, both grand and modest,
to demonstrate the unfathomable might of this Astralink scholar!

Perhaps I should prepare more tea and sweets,
Set up chairs and a table for afternoon tea,
And arrange a unique welcoming ceremony?

Yip~ Look who we have here today! A new visitor!
<color=#c78745>{访客}</color>,
you must be a friend, aren't you?
<color=#695c3a>So one can learn such fascinating things at school.</color>
<size=30>Wait a moment— do we have anything left to make tea with?</size>
BFF
Family who are like friends

...(thinking)
This exceeds my comprehension...
Are they friends or merely classmates in the end?

Just met?
Was it when we first met on the Astralink transit?

But I should remember that.
Oh, if you need me to,
I can protect your loved ones.

So you're actually blood relatives!
It seems the bond between you
was already woven into the depths of destiny at birth.

We've only just met?! It certainly doesn't feel that way!
Though being new acquaintances is perfectly fine. As they say back home,
"First time strangers, second time..."

Could you please tell <color=#c78745>{访客}</color>?
M-my tail is not for touching...

Threatening <color=#c78745>{visitor}</color> with mysterious heads,
They never visited again...
Should I assume there's no need for a formal apology?
Fated Rival

I see now,
Don't let them lead you astray,
I rather like who you are right now~ Just like this.

A friend has come to visit from afar,
Like a rare shooting star streaking across the night sky,
Making one crane their curious neck...

Today's Garden Magic is—
A descending <color=#c78745>{visitor}</color>! Yip-haha~yip!
May your friend find joy in their stay here!

It sounds like...
This must be how mature adults socialize and make friends!
As expected of you.

Yip~ Watching you two interact,
I would have thought you were old friends.

How should I describe this...
Ah, I know! It's like kindred spirits finding each other!
This must be what fortune tellers call "the red thread of fate."
A familiar friend

Tick tock, tick tock, as these lively moments slip away.
But before we continue, might I ask about your relationship
with today's <color=#c78745>{访客}</color>?

Last night, as I observed the celestial river,
I witnessed a miraculous convergence of paths...
And just as I predicted, our <color=#c78745>{visitor}</color> has come to play today!

Your friend just ran past me.
I'm not very good at making new friends,
because I can't remember names.

This is something I need to study.
I shall observe
your relationship carefully.

That works perfectly fine!
I can fill balloons every day,
and savor the anticipation of waiting!
It would be rather painful if it hits your head, you know.

Your name?
I'm sure I remember it... hmm... hmm.
Farewell, Bhan!
Familiar Friend
they're my family

How close of friends are we exactly?
Close enough that I don't need to return a borrowed brush that I lost{短暂停}perhaps?
Oh, my apologies, I was just looking for the brush.

<size=30>Shh! I know all about it!</size>
So tell me, have you two not
confessed your feelings to each other yet?

<color=#c78745>{访客}</color>
Running so many laps around here without breaking a sweat...
They must be an extraordinary martial arts prodigy.

Yeep! New little friends visiting has made everything so lively!
I'm absolutely over-the-moon!
Dr. Moss says I'm being... what was it... "naturally effervescent"?

They say that between friends,
habits, hobbies, and catchphrases
can spread without one even noticing.

I believe it must be someone you trust.
Oh, and if they bring any supernatural curiosities...
(Draws out the short blade "Yokai Head")

If you don't have a preferred style in mind,
I'm quite skilled at creating personalized coordinates,
Charming ones, if I do say so~

I was just observing what appears to be
a humanoid anomaly of sorts.
Though I'm not entirely certain if it's actually a person.

Ah, I understand! So it's what they call "growing up wearing the same pants"...
But why did you all wear the same pants when you were young?
Was there something special about those pants?!

Oh, so you're a fellow companion for our adventure!
In that case, your friends shall be my friends as well.
I shall make sure to give them a proper welcome!

From unknown to familiar - that's how new friends are made!
Some say life is an adventure of constant discovery,
And finding new friends is part of that journey.

...(thinking)
Oh, how could family
be like friends?
Dear Friend
Friends closer than family

But what kind of bonds are they exactly?
Please, do tell me! (curious)

I can't believe any normal person would do this.
Oh, but if it makes you happy,
I'll pretend I didn't see anything... within the rules, of course.

I think Mobai has some misunderstandings about me.
Does he really think that without a surprise box,
I can't find~ ways to make my friends happy?

I'll be careful when practicing my punches,
I won't accidentally smash
<color=#c78745>{访客}</color>'s car!
my classmate
is my friend

Oh? Your friend has already left?
And here I was hoping the three of us
could share my sixth meal of the day.

However, I must confess I simply cannot rise early.
And as for when your friend might arrive,
I'm afraid I'm not quite certain.
Shh... that's the person I secretly admire

However, this "destined showdown" of yours,
It's actually just a competition of "who can catch more fish," isn't it?
Manna has figured it out!

So you grew up together, studied together, and worked together?
What wonderful familiar companions...
Yeep~ That's the beauty of an enduring friendship.

Ah yes, so you're a kindred spirit,
Manna understands completely! <size=64>Truly understands!</size>

May I teach your friend—
The one who just ran past,
The special technique of rolling in the grass?

Today, while I was coloring my usual palette,
I noticed I had used a few extra hues,
Only to realize the scenery had gained some new friends.

Oh, a new friend has arrived!
Then I, Manna, shall prepare
our Lu family's special "Ceremonial Welcome Tea"—
A New Friend I Just Met
the object of my affection
Secret Crush

...Oh my, I'm not surprised at all.
But why are you afraid?
Let me keep an eye on this person for you.

But there's only one true technique,
And that is sincerity - the most touching sentiment of all.
"Destined rivals"... Yeep! It has this wonderful sense of fate, like "when we meet, we'll light up like festival fireworks and absolutely blast off into the sky!"

Hehe~ You must be wondering how I knew about that.
I would never tell you that I've been secretly follow- oh, I mean,
conducting covert observations of you all for quite some time!
A New Friend
Someone I Don't Dare to Have a Secret Crush On

I just saw <color=#c78745>{visitor}</color>,
Running gracefully past me,
You two share the same rhythm in your steps.

<color=#d3b037>{me}</color> and I also grew close as newly acquainted friends.
Life needs such delightful freshness, how lovely~.

<color=#c78745>{访客}</color>?
The person <color=#d3b037>{me}</color> invited...
Yes, that was the name.

"How delightful it is to have friends coming from afar!"
Yes, yes, I understand completely.
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color> can rest assured.

While I was shaking the trees just now,
I noticed we have a new friend!
Are you here to visit <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>?

We have a visitor here,
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color> appears to be
more energetic than usual, which is wonderful.

Oh, you're the one <color=#d3b037>{me}</color> invited?
No worries, I haven't done anything yet,
I was just making sure you were... normal.

Would you satisfy my little curiosity?
What kind of friends are <color=#d3b037>{me}</color> and <color=#c78745>{访客}</color>?

I'm exercising restraint, holding myself back.
Through multiple observations, those invited by <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>
are running around and touching everything...

Ah, I see... Having <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>'s friend visit has given me this peculiar sense of pride.
If only I could know in advance next time when a visitor is coming...

I heard that <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>'s friend has come to visit.
Might your friend need some style recommendations?
I'm well-versed in all the styles that have appeared.

By the Celestial River above, let the Lumia connect our friendship through these cards!
Lauffie, <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, and <color=#c78745>{visitor}</color> are true friends indeed!

<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, if you and your friend are going to shake trees,
please be careful,
Hmm, I can't remember which tree I left my magazine in...

Oh my! Such close friends you are?
Then <color=#d3b037>{me}</color> must be my dearest friend as well,
And surely, a dearest friend's dearest friend would also be my dearest friend, wouldn't they?
I'm curious to know, how did <color=#d3b037>{me}</color> and <color=#c78745>{访客}</color> become friends?
As expected of <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>'s dear companion!

<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, your friend has come to visit,
and just like you,
they're such a delightful person to be around!

Today, while I was looking for fur{短暂停}— playing games with squirrels,
I encountered <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>'s friend <color=#c78745>{访客}</color>,
Hmm, now how did I come to know your friend's name...

How is the relationship between the recent <color=#c78745>{visitor}</color> and
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color> defined?

I've made a fascinating discovery!
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color> and <color=#c78745>{访客}</color> share a
most peculiar connection!

Are you here to visit <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>?
Looking at the color blocks I painted,
You'll surely capture some wonderful photos here today~.

Unknown things
always carry certain risks.
...Was it <color=#d3b037>{me}</color> who invited them?

Between <color=#c78745>{访客}</color> and me,
What does <color=#d3b037>{me}</color> think?
Well, due to various uncertainties...

When I saw <color=#d3b037>{me}</color> and <color=#c78745>{访客}</color> walking together,
it reminded me of my dear friend who grew up with me.
I'm quite curious, what kind of relationship do you two share?

Oh, it's <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>'s friend!
Hmm, I should prepare some tea and snacks~
Would you like to welcome your friend?

Another lively day here at Astralink!
All thanks to the beloved <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>!
Our little corner is becoming quite the delightful haven!
I've observed that <color=#c78745>{访客}</color> and <color=#d3b037>{me}</color> share an impressive talent for remaining perfectly stationary.

I lost 4 pens today...
If <color=#d3b037>{me}</color> or your friend <color=#c78745>{访客}</color> happens to find them,
could you let me know?
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>'s friend <color=#c78745>{访客}</color> seems to enjoy chatting and having a wonderful time here. Perhaps... we should invite them to stay in our world for a while?

Yeep! <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>'s friends are coming to visit?!
I shall certainly demonstrate the finest hospitality as their host!
